author: taylor
msg: Added PsmlManager.caching-on property to Jrp. It is used by DatabasePsmlManagerService to enable caching.

Removed code to read in data for psml browser from the session, as this action is not tied into the creation/deletion of roles/users etc. Hence the psml entries are invalid in the earlier stated circumstances. Now this action executes the query each time buildNormalContext is called.

author: morciuch
msg: Switching the preview method from psml to a screen template which is more reliable.

author: morciuch
msg: Initial implementation of customizer portlet preview (see Bugzilla issue# 11565). Very much work in progress with outstanding issues documented in Bugziilla.
This feature is activated by setting customizer.preview.enable=true in jr.props. Two alternative preview methods exist:
2. Using preview.vm template (may be uncommented in customizer-portletset-add.vm).

author: ggolden
msg: Added protected selectUrl(), so this can be subclassed with

author: morciuch
msg: Updated code standards with respect to style checking and internationalization.
